Class MainView

  • java.lang.Object
    • Views.MainView

  • public class MainView
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is used to get user input for different method used in it.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    shreyas

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.Scanner keyboard

      MainView()
      This is the default constructor of MainView which takes input value.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String addContinentView()
      This method is used to add new Continents to the Map
      java.lang.String addTerritoryView()
      This method is used to add new Territory to the Map
      java.lang.String fileNameToEditOrLoadView()
      This method will display the map whether to edit or load file.
      java.lang.String fileNameToSaveView()
      This method will have a string value which is a file name.
      int lineNumberToEditView()
      This method will ask the player to enter line number to edit in game.
      int mapSelectionView()
      This method will display three options to select 1.create a new map,2.to edit a map,3.load a previous map.
      java.lang.String newLineToReplaceWithView(boolean editContinent)
      This method will display the line to be replaced
      int playerCountView()
      this method will display total number of player's and also size of the territories
      void startupPhaseView()
      This method contains the startup phase of the game which includes map selection, building a map, if the map is valid then assigning countries to players randomly and letting the user place armies in the assigned countries
      boolean wantToEditContinentView()
      This method will ask whether player wants to edit a continent or not
      boolean wantToEditMapView()
      This method will ask whether to edit current map yes or no in it.
      boolean wantToEditMorelinesView()
      This method will provide a option to edit more lines yes or no in it.
      boolean wantToPlaceArmiesManually()
      This method will provide two option to place armies manually or automatically
